UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT SOUTHERN DISTRICT OF NEW YORK
UNITED STATES OF AMERICA,
-against-
TOVA NOEL and MICHAEL THOMAS,
Defendants.
ANALISA TORRES, District Judge:
It is hereby ORDERED that an initial conference is scheduled for November 25, 2019, at 12:00 p.m. in Courtroom 15D of the United States Courthouse, 500 Pearl Street, New York, New York.
SO ORDERED.
Dated: November 19, 2019
New York, New York
ANALISA TORRES
United States District Judge
USDC SDNY
